snippet: A felon who was wearing body armor when the police arrested him in a Detroit suburb has been described as a person of interest in an investigation into the fatal shooting of three men.
abstract: Detroit police question a felon who was wearing body armor when arrested in connection with shooting at barbershop in which three people were killed and six others wounded.
lead_paragraph: A felon who was wearing body armor when the police arrested him in a Detroit suburb has been described as a person of interest in an investigation into the fatal shooting of three men.

headline.main: Michigan: Man Detained After 9 Are Shot at Barbershop
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Man Detained After 9 Are Shot at Barbershop
